</div>

This front replacement bumper is now available with several exciting new features that will satisfy any off-roading adventurer. It is manufactured from 3mm and 5mm all-steel material to protect your engineu2019s vitals. It boasts full winch compatibility and two snatch-rated recovery points, as well as a class-leading approach angle.<br />\nThis bumper comes standard with a heavy-duty bash plate that continues all the way to the cross-member. Other brands charge a premium for this extra feature.</p>\n<p>The Plug and Play LED fog lights are fully compatible with the existing electrics. The Evolution 3D Bumper includes provision for headlight washers and parking sensors.</p>\n<p><b>Colour options:</b><br />\nThe Evolution 3D Bumper is zinc coated for corrosion protection and finished in a hard-wearing powder coat. Standard colours are white or matt black. The middle section of the bumper is available in polished stainless steel or matt black.</p>\n<p><b>Safety:</b><br />\nThe Evolution 3D Bumper has passed many dynamic crash tests in Australia to ensure it adheres to the existing safety systems for example, air bags. Air bags must fire at the right time. The Evolution 3D Bumper is airbag compatible and certified.</p>\n<p><b>Airflow:</b><br />\nOur bumpers have been tested to provide maximum airflow to all the necessary cooling parts of your engine.</p>\n<p><b>Installation:</b><br />\nThe new Evolution 3D Bumper is the first modular, three-piece designed bumper replacement. This is what differentiates it from all other replacement bumpers. The standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be kept or sold.</p>\n<p><b>Includes:</b><br />\n&#8211; Standard winch mount<br />\n&#8211; Integrated LED fog lights<br />\n&#8211; 5mm aluminium bash or protection plate<br />\n&#8211; Two snatch-rated vehicle recovery points<br />\n&#8211; Front parking sensors (PDC) cut outs</p>\n<p><b>Optional extras:</b><br />\n&#8211; Colour coding to your vehicleu2019s specification<br />\n&#8211; It looks great in full stainless steel and is PDC &#8211; parking sensor compatible. </p>\n<p>Our rear bumpers are unique and will defiantly stand out from the crowd. </p>\n<p><b>Colour options:</b><br />\nThe Evolution Rear Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing powder coat and is available in black or full stainless steel.</p>\n<p><b>Includes:</b><br />\nu2022 Square hitch tow bar receiver rated to 3 350kg<br />\nu2022 Non-slip tread plate</p>\n<p>On request they can be optioned to be non-reverse sensor compatible and supplied with blanketing Rhino 4&#215;4 rock sliders are:</b></p>\n<p>u2022 Made with 3mm wall thickness mild steel<br />\nu2022 Bolted directly to your chassis<br />\nu2022 Bolted with a 6mm laser-cut folded plate and high tensile zinc plated bolts<br />\nu2022 Finished with a hard-wearing flat black powder coat<br />\nu2022 Practically designed with the Rhino 4X4 mix of tough and subtle styling</p>\n<p>No vehicle modifications or welding is required to install our sliders. They protrude just enough to be used as a step. Their main purpose is vehicle protection, with the added benefit of making your Fortuner look tough.</p>\n<p><b>Includes:</b></p>\n<p>u2022 Left and right rock sliders<br />\nu2022 Powder coated flat black for durability<br />\nu2022 Two high lift jacking points<br />\nu2022 Full bolt kit including heavy duty 6mm brackets</p>\n","variation_id":5218,"variation_is_active":true,"variation_is_visible":true,"weight":"","weight_html":"N/A"}]">
<table class="variations" cellspacing="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="label"><label for="pa_variations">VARIATIONS</label></td>
<td class="value">
<div class="woocommerce-select"><select id="pa_variations" class="" name="attribute_pa_variations" data-attribute_name="attribute_pa_variations" data-show_option_none="yes"><option value="">Choose your Product</option><option class="attached enabled" value="evolution-3d-front-bumper">EVOLUTION 3D FRONT BUMPER</option><option class="attached enabled" value="evolution-rear-bumper">EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER</option><option class="attached enabled" value="rock-sliders">ROCK SLIDERS</option></select></div>
<p><a class="reset_variations" href="https://www.rhino4x4.co.za/mitsubishi-triton-mr/#">Clear</a></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<div class="single_variation_wrap">
<div class="woocommerce-variation single_variation">
<div class="woocommerce-variation-description">
<p><b>The Rhino 4×4 rock sliders are:</b></p>
<p>• Made with 3mm wall thickness mild steel</p>
<p>• Bolted directly to your chassis</p>
<p>• Bolted with a 6mm laser-cut folded plate and high tensile zinc plated bolts</p>
<p>• Finished with a hard-wearing flat black powder coat</p>
<p>• Practically designed with the Rhino 4X4 mix of tough and subtle styling</p>
<p>No vehicle modifications or welding is required to install our sliders. They protrude just enough to be used as a step. Their main purpose is vehicle protection, with the added benefit of making your Fortuner look tough.</p>
<p><b>Includes:</b></p>
<p>• Left and right rock sliders</p>
<p>• Powder coated flat black for durability</p>
<p>• Two high lift jacking points</p>
<p>• Full bolt kit including heavy duty 6mm brackets</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
